name: energy-data
title: A list of datasets related to Energy

fields.name: Source
fields.description: The current data owner or maintainer

fields.name: URL
fields.description: A webpage which describes the data and provides download links

fields.name: Example URL
fields.description: Any example applications or visualisations which illustrate this specific dataset

fields.name: Updated
fields.description: In which year was this dataset last updated

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: Any keywords, space delimited, which help us to sort through the datasets. Include an ISO country code (ch, uk, ...), if it is country-specific.

fields.name: License
fields.description: Brief description of the terms of use, along with detailed links to any License or such

fields.name: Comments
fields.description: Further details related to format, content, or usage

contributors.title: Opendata.ch - Swiss chapter of Open Knowledge
